title: Our Overwatch Future - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/17/19
itunes:title: Our Overwatch Future - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/17/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Arthur Holland Michel explore new satellite surveillance technology developed by the Pentagon that can monitor entire cities at one time, how it can be abused, and if it is being used to violate our rights right now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
